Title: Secondary prevention of bleeding in people with previous oesophageal variceal bleeding due to decompensated liver cirrhosis: A network meta-analysis
Abstract: © 2018 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To compare the benefits and harms of different treatments for the prevention of rebleeding in people with a history of oesophageal varices due to decompensated liver cirrhosis.
